This hands-on experience is ideal for food lovers and even includes round-trip hotel transfers and a chance to enjoy your meal with newfound friends.

strIntroduction: Tonle Sap Lake is a fertile lake treasured by the Cambodian people. Today, we will take you to explore the Cambodian life style in a village on the stilts, Kompong Phluk. Take a boat, see the surprising views around, you will find the unique Cambodian experience here！

strIntroduction: The show takes you on a journey from foundation to prosperity of Angkor and the worldwide famous Angkor Vat, through folk tales to ancient customs, from past to present.

strIntroduction: Siem Reap city is so crowd with tourists? You want to find a more peaceful destination for comfort your mind. This tour is the best option for such purpose. Kampong Khleang, which is well-known as the largest floating village in Cambodia, will be your ideal discovery. You will head out of Siem Reap city and visit the beautiful countryside area. There, we together cycle along the red soil roads, visit local people and have lunch with them. How interesting joining in outdoor activities is! Our tour will satisfy you immediately. Let’s book it now.
strTitle: Enjoy Countryside Atmosphere In Floating Village Kampong Khleang

strIntroduction: Banteay Srei & Kbal Spean Full Day Tour will take you to the see treasure-trove of Khmer including Banteay Srei & Kbal Spean.

strIntroduction: Kirirom National Park is the most famous national park in Cambodia. It will bring you a lot of joys by exploring through the nature environment around you.

strIntroduction: How a morning in your trip should start? That’s waiting for the sunrise at Angkor Wat and Angkor Thom Temples. You will feel your trip more meaningful. The ancient beauty of these temples in the starting-day point will make you admirable. Then, you also visit other temples such as Bayon Temple with its 54 towers…., and Phimeanakas, which will be unforgettable memories.

strIntroduction: You will meet a young local artist who will tell you his life story and how he became involved with art. The artist now works with a local charity, Colors of Cambodia. The project was set up by William Gentry in 2003 and aims to support children between five and sixteen years of age from the most underprivileged schools in the Siem Reap area.
strTitle: Colors Of Cambodia - Painting Angkor - Private Tour

strIntroduction: Follow KKday, get to know more about the fundamental Cambodia by visiting the traditional villages and talk to the local people. Also, we will visit the Angkor Silk Farm to see the beauty of handcrafts.
